msbt.message: Here's that present I tried to give you earlier. I wanted to make sure you got it before it goes out of style. Sometimes staying ahead of the trend feels like a full-time job! Anyway...enjoy!

I picked this out just for you. Last time I tried to give it to you things didn't go to plan, so I've resorted to using good old-fashioned snail mail. I know—so retro! Now stop reading and open it already.
Remember that thank-you gift I got for you? Well, I decided to do the classy thing and have it delivered right to your door. I'm just THAT grateful.
